sentences.en: He backed a provision that would allow judges to delay granting a divorce decree in some cases.
sentences.cn: 他赞成一项允许法官在一些情况下延迟作出离婚判决的法律条款。

sentences.en: He did not make any provision for his children's education.
sentences.cn: 他没为孩子的教育作任何准备.

sentences.en: He made provisions for his wife and his children in his will.
sentences.cn: 在遗嘱里他为妻子和孩子都做好了安排。

sentences.en: I take an assortment of clothes on holiday, as a provision against the vagaries of the weather.
sentences.cn: 我带了各种衣服去度假，以防天气突变。

sentences.en: Mr King asked if it had ever occurred to her to make provision for her own pension.
sentences.cn: 金先生问她是否曾想过要为自己的养老金预先作安排。

sentences.en: One provision of the law was to roll back taxes to the 1975 level.
sentences.cn: 这部法律其中一项条款是将税收降低到1975年的水平。

sentences.en: Special provision should be made for children.
sentences.cn: 应给孩子在经济上专门作好安排。

sentences.en: The agreement includes a provision for each side to check the other side’s weapons.
sentences.cn: 协议有项规定，允许双方互查武器。

sentences.en: The bill's provision for the sale and purchase of land faces stiff opposition from conservatives.
sentences.cn: 该法案关于土地买卖的规定遭到保守派的强硬反对。

sentences.en: The department is responsible for the provision of residential care services.
sentences.cn: 该部门负责提供家庭护理服务。

sentences.en: The gap between the best and poorest childcare provision in the European Union has widened.
sentences.cn: 欧盟最好和最差的儿童保育服务之间的差距扩大了。

sentences.en: The provision of credit would therefore permit these enterprises to expand.
sentences.cn: 对这些企业提供信贷无疑会促使其扩展.

sentences.en: This provision ensures to / for us a voice in the subject.
sentences.cn: 这个规定使我们对这个问题有了发言权.

sentences.en: This provision ensures to us a vote in this matter.
sentences.cn: 这个规定使我们对这件事有发言权.

sentences.en: This provision gives the president total and unchecked power.
sentences.cn: 这条规定赋予了总统绝对及不受约束的权力。
这一条款在1990年被撤销了.

sentences.en: Under the provisions of the Act, employers must supply safety equipment.
sentences.cn: 该法令规定，雇主必须提供安全设备。

sentences.en: We had enough provisions for two weeks.
sentences.cn: 我们的粮食足够应付两星期。
